reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Smart Switch, Wi-Fi 2nd Gen, Neutral Wire Required, Works with Matter, My Leviton, Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple Home/Siri & Wired or Wire-Free 3-Way, D215S-1RW, White
reviews.text: I've had trouble getting other brands of wifi witches to pair with my dual band router. Most of those are 2.4 GHz and don't want to pair with with my 2.4GHz/5GHz router. I have returned items because they wouldn't pair. I saw a YouTube video about installing wifi switches and the guy said he had no pairing problems with Leviton wifi switches at 2.4GHz. He was right. I installed it and in less than five minutes it was paired and working. To reduce a lot of frustration I highly recommend the Leviton wifi switches.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2025
reviews.title: Reduce pairing frustration with this wifi switch

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Smart Switch, Wi-Fi 2nd Gen, Neutral Wire Required, Works with Matter, My Leviton, Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple Home/Siri & Wired or Wire-Free 3-Way, D215S-1RW, White
reviews.text: The Leviton was the only switch I found that didn't need a hub to operate. Install just like a normal switch, download the app, and you're done. I now schedule the front garage and porch lights to come on at dusk and turn off at 11 pm. They also have wall outlets available as well that will do the same. No need for apple, google, or any other hubs.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2025
reviews.title: No hub needed!

reviews.text: After I installed the switch I tried to connect to the Leviton app but it kept giving me an error message. I also tried to connect to HomeKit with no luck. I tried to find an answer to the error message through Leviton but finally gave up and returned it.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2025

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Smart Switch, Wi-Fi 2nd Gen, Neutral Wire Required, Works with Matter, My Leviton, Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple Home/Siri & Wired or Wire-Free 3-Way, D215S-1RW, White
reviews.text: I installed this switch to control my porch light (which at Christmas powers my Christmas decorations). I installed it in a three gang box that was already crowded with wires. The switch is larger than a standard non-smart switch and requires a neutral wire connection. Even though I had to add a new neutral wire from the existing neutral wires in the box to connect the switch, I got everything to fit. I control all of my plugs and switches with the Leviton app. Easy to connect to the internet, set up schedules, etc. Have experienced no problems with any of my Leviton smart products.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2025
reviews.title: Good product. Works well

reviews.title: I have dozens of these. Love them!!

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Smart Switch, Wi-Fi 2nd Gen, Neutral Wire Required, Works with Matter, My Leviton, Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple Home/Siri & Wired or Wire-Free 3-Way, D215S-1RW, White
reviews.text: First, Leviton is high quality, no question. This is not my first automatic Leviton switch, this was a second buy. This switch comes with a nice screwless wall plate, which you can use if you have a lone switch to replace. It easily connects with your wifi system using your phone and the MyLeviton app, where you can set up schedules for on and off times, including basing them on sundown or sunrise. For instance, I set mine to come on ten minutes after sunset and go off at 10:30pm, every day. Now, installation: Is this for a DIYer or for an electrician to install? If you know nothing about house wiring, don't plan on doing this yourself. Nothing wrong with how it's built, but you can run into interesting issues when you open a box with, say, three or four other switches in it. It may seem to have a confusing jumble of wires, the switch you're replacing may have no neutral (white) coming to it, and you'll need to figure out which wire goes to the source and which goes to the load. All that said, if you DO know what you're doing with house wiring, this is a snap to install (aside from the problems just mentioned). The switch is likely larger than the one you're replacing, and there may be scant room for it. The switch has wires coming out of it (i.e., no screw terminals or insert holes) that you attach to existing wiring with wire nuts, and you need to cram all that in the box. Note that this switch can be used in two-way or three-way configurations. Full disclosure, I have used it only in two-way on/off applications.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2025
reviews.title: Easy to set up with an on/off schedule...

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Smart Switch, Wi-Fi 2nd Gen, Neutral Wire Required, Works with Matter, My Leviton, Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple Home/Siri & Wired or Wire-Free 3-Way, D215S-1RW, White

Very happy to get this done because I was dreading having to be on a helpline for hours at a time and that did not happen.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2024
reviews.title: Support was great

reviews.text: This light switch is easy to install and control with the Leviton app. I have programmed it to turn on at dusk and turn off at dawn. Using the app I can turn the light on and off when I want as well. I have used other smart switches from other brand companies and they were not as easy to install or control, the last ge one I had only lasted 7 months before dying.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2024
reviews.title: Easy to install and use

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Smart Switch, Wi-Fi 2nd Gen, Neutral Wire Required, Works with Matter, My Leviton, Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple Home/Siri & Wired or Wire-Free 3-Way, D215S-1RW, White
reviews.text: I have 35 of these switches. More than half of the 35 has failed at some point. Leviton will have you jumping through hoops to proof it the switch and not your Wi-Fi. It has always been the switch. The internal relay just stopped working. They have you take a picture of the switch in the wall. You have to wait 10 days or more to get a new switch. If you have multiple switches on a breaker, it flips them out when you turn the power off and back on to replace the switch. If I only knew this 5 years ago, I would not have gone with Leviton.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2024
reviews.title: Garbage

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Smart Switch, Wi-Fi 2nd Gen, Neutral Wire Required, Works with Matter, My Leviton, Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple Home/Siri & Wired or Wire-Free 3-Way, D215S-1RW, White
reviews.text: Unfortunately, these switches don't appear to last. This (expensive) switch replaces one that is out of warranty and has stopped working, and now a second switch has stopped working. I've punted and am replacing many of my Leviton switches with less expensive (Kasa) ones that appear to work fine, are better designed, and last longer. I don't recommend Leviton Smart Switches because they don't last, and they are poorly designed (from my POV).
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2024
reviews.title: Replacing a 5 year old switch that stopped working

reviews.text: I had these in my old house, but the problem I had with them is I only got a year's use out of them at a time. These don't seem to last like they should. My smoke detectors batteries last longer than these do.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Smart Switch, Wi-Fi 2nd Gen, Neutral Wire Required, Works with Matter, My Leviton, Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple Home/Siri & Wired or Wire-Free 3-Way, D215S-1RW, White
reviews.text: Cool concept! It works as advertised ... for a while. Three switches installed. Two failed after 4 yrs, the third lasted 5 yrs. One day they just quit and didn't work via wi-fi, nor manually toggling it. Tested them with multi-meter and nothing. Suspect cheap circuitry that simply doesn't hold up. Save yourself some money and install a standard switch.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2024
reviews.title: Fails in a few years

reviews.text: Big to set in a crowded box. Running a paddle fan on it.....it failed twice....contacts close ...you can hear them click no power applied to fan . Ordered a third we will see how long it lasts. My home is a smart home and I have no issues with any products. Easy to.install in an uncrowded switchbox.The app works well. I do not like that they added advertisements to the app which is annoying. I recommend the product. The app use to be good till thr greed took over.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2024
reviews.title: 95% reliable app was great till ads were added.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Smart Switch, Wi-Fi 2nd Gen, Neutral Wire Required, Works with Matter, My Leviton, Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple Home/Siri & Wired or Wire-Free 3-Way, D215S-1RW, White
reviews.text: Installed these in 3 of my houses now, and they always work great. Only SLIGHT issue is, if you lose power and they turn back on before your WiFi is back up, they may get a little confused. But still 1000 times more stable than any other smart switch brand I’ve tried. Install is easy. If you’re living off grid like I am, they draw very low vampire power.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2024
reviews.title: Other brands need not apply
